languages.text: "Боюсь, Лорд-капитан, без серьезного вмешательства опытного оздоровителя мне эту слабость не одолеть самому. Святый Трон, как же тяжело быть бессильным стариком! Всегда надеялся, что не доживу до дней, когда спина и руки будут отказывать, а вот же ж..."

traits.locale_text: "Боюсь, Лорд-капитан, без серьезного вмешательства опытного медикуса мне эту слабость не одолеть самому. Святый Трон, как же тяжело быть бессильным стариком! Всегда надеялся, что не доживу до дней, когда спина и руки будут отказывать, а вот же ж..."

languages.text: "I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced rejuvenat adept, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, Лорд-капитан, без серьезного вмешательства опытного оздоровителя мне эту слабость не одолеть самому. Святый Трон, как же тяжело быть бессильным стариком! Всегда надеялся, что не доживу до дней, когда спина и руки будут отказывать, а вот же ж..."

traits.locale_text: "I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced medicus, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."

"I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced medicus, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."

"I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced medicus, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."

"I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced rejuvenat adept, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."

"I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced rejuvenat adept, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."

languages.text: “舰长大人，如果没有经验丰富的治愈大师，我恐怕无法靠自己的力量克服这种虚弱感。黄金王座在上，身为无助的老人，这种感觉实在是太煎熬了！我一直希望自己能早点死，不要等到背部和双手虚弱不堪时才咽气，可看看我现在……”
languages.original_text: "I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced rejuvenat adept, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，如果没有经验丰富的治愈大师，我恐怕无法靠自己的力量克服这种虚弱感。黄金王座在上，身为无助的老人，这种感觉实在是太煎熬了！我一直希望自己能早点死，不要等到背部和双手虚弱不堪时才咽气，可看看我现在……”

languages.original_text: "I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced rejuvenat adept, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, me temo que sin la intervención de un adepto rejuvenat experimentado no podré superar esta fragilidad. Por el Trono, ¡es duro ser un viejo indefenso! Siempre había esperado morir mucho antes de que mis manos y mi espalda cedieran a la edad, y ahora míreme...».
languages.original_text: "I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced rejuvenat adept, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, me temo que sin la intervención de un adepto rejuvenat experimentado no podré superar esta fragilidad. Por el Trono, ¡es duro ser un viejo indefenso! Siempre había esperado morir mucho antes de que mis manos y mi espalda cedieran a la edad, y ahora míreme...».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、経験豊かな若返り技術者がいなければ、私一人ではこの虚弱な体質を克服することはできないでしょう。祝福されし玉座よ、無力な老人であることはなんとつらいことか！背中と手が擦り切れる前に死んでしまいたいといつも思っていたものですが…」
languages.original_text: "I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced rejuvenat adept, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、経験豊かな若返り技術者がいなければ、私一人ではこの虚弱な体質を克服することはできないでしょう。祝福されし玉座よ、無力な老人であることはなんとつらいことか！背中と手が擦り切れる前に死んでしまいたいといつも思っていたものですが…」

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, Lord Captain, dass ich diese Schwäche ohne die Intervention eines erfahrenen Rejuvenat Adept nicht werde überwinden können. Gesegneter Thron, es ist nicht leicht, ein hilfloser alter Mann zu sein! Ich hatte immer gehofft, ich würde sterben, bevor mein Rücken und meine Hände aufgeben, und nun seht mich an ..."
languages.original_text: "I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced rejuvenat adept, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, Lord Captain, dass ich diese Schwäche ohne die Intervention eines erfahrenen Rejuvenat Adept nicht werde überwinden können. Gesegneter Thron, es ist nicht leicht, ein hilfloser alter Mann zu sein! Ich hatte immer gehofft, ich würde sterben, bevor mein Rücken und meine Hände aufgeben, und nun seht mich an ..."

languages.text: « J'ai bien peur de ne pas pouvoir surmonter cette faiblesse sans l'intervention d'un adepte du Rejuvenat. Par le Trône, qu'il est difficile d'être un vieillard impuissant ! J'ai toujours espéré que je mourrais bien avant que mon dos et mes mains ne capitulent, mais regardez dans quel état je me trouve à présent... »
languages.original_text: "I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced rejuvenat adept, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai bien peur de ne pas pouvoir surmonter cette faiblesse sans l'intervention d'un adepte du Rejuvenat. Par le Trône, qu'il est difficile d'être un vieillard impuissant ! J'ai toujours espéré que je mourrais bien avant que mon dos et mes mains ne capitulent, mais regardez dans quel état je me trouve à présent... »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, korkarım tecrübeli bir gençleştirme uzmanının müdahalesi olmaksızın bu zafiyetle başa çıkamayacağım. Taht aşkına, zavallı bir ihtiyar olmak öyle zor ki! Elimin ve belimin tutmayacağı o gün gelmeden yitip gitmek isterdim hep. Şu hâle bak..."
languages.original_text: "I fear, Lord Captain, that without the intervention of an experienced rejuvenat adept, I will not be able to overcome this frailty on my own. Blessed Throne, it is hard to be a helpless old man! I always hoped I would die long before the day my back and hands gave out, and look at me now..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, korkarım tecrübeli bir gençleştirme uzmanının müdahalesi olmaksızın bu zafiyetle başa çıkamayacağım. Taht aşkına, zavallı bir ihtiyar olmak öyle zor ki! Elimin ve belimin tutmayacağı o gün gelmeden yitip gitmek isterdim hep. Şu hâle bak..."
